item.title: About
item.description: Top tier living in a middle tier co-op at a bottom tier Silicon Valley mansion. Data engineering @ Facebook’s AML/FAIR. Ex Quora.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Thank you for visiting my very own space on the Internet. It’s unfortunate, though, that I’m not quite sure what to do with it. You’ll have to forgive me in the intermeaning time if it looks a bit bare. The current idea is for it to soon look scattered, giving me good reason to buy some furniture. By the end of it, I’m thinking of something like this:
